scripts.build: hexo generate && rm -rf .homepage && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/SimonAKing/HomePage.git .homepage && node -e 'const fs=require("fs");const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync("package.json","utf8"));const o=pkg.landingPage||{};const p=".homepage/config.json";const cfg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,"utf8"));if(o.name){cfg.head=cfg.head||{};cfg.intro=cfg.intro||{};cfg.main=cfg.main||{};cfg.head.title=o.name;cfg.intro.title=o.name;cfg.main.name=o.name;}if(o.signature){cfg.main=cfg.main||{};cfg.main.signature=o.signature;}if(o.avatar){cfg.main=cfg.main||{};cfg.main.avatar=cfg.main.avatar||{};cfg.main.avatar.link=o.avatar;}if(o.email){cfg.main=cfg.main||{};cfg.main.ul=cfg.main.ul||{};cfg.main.ul.third=cfg.main.ul.third||{};cfg.main.ul.third.href=o.email;}if(o.github){cfg.main=cfg.main||{};cfg.main.ul=cfg.main.ul||{};cfg.main.ul.fourth=cfg.main.ul.fourth||{};cfg.main.ul.fourth.href=o.github;}fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(cfg,null,"\t")+"\n");' && cd .homepage && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -R .homepage/dist/* public/
